question: The Forest and Environment Department of Odisha divided the Agro-Climatic zone into how many parts?
explanation: 10 Agro-Climatic zones are North-Western Plateau, North-Central Plateau, North- Eastern Coastal Plain, East and South-Eastern Coastal Plain, North-Eastern Ghats, Eastern Ghats Highland, South-Eastern Ghats, Western Undulating Zone, Western Central Table Land, Mid Central Table Land.
